title: Two Sum
problemsDetails:
Given nums target an array of integers nums and an integer target, return indices of the two numbers such that they add up to target.

You may assume that each input would have exactly one solution, and you may not use the same element twice.

You can return the answer in any order.

title: Reverse String
problemsDetails:
Write a function that takes a string as input and returns the string reversed.

You may assume that the input string contains only lowercase letters.

title: Palindrome Check
problemsDetails: Write a function that takes a string as input and returns `true` if the string is a palindrome (reads the same forwards and backwards), and `false` otherwise.
